can you see them in any applications?
for the terminal, the reason why the scrollbar was blank was due to there nothing to scroll up or down to in that screehshot
you may need to change your window decorations or GTK theme

i did.  5 times
oh
I detect a problem with your personal settings or compiz's configuration
I'll turn off compiz first and see if it persists
you're right, the problem is in Compiz
check system > preferences > advanced desktop effects settings
what next?
I'm not sure exactly which setting would need to be changed
